FuncDef: This command configures port link dampening timers which reduce the number of link transitions reported to upper layer protocols. Thehold-timevalue dampens interface transitions.

ParaDef.Info:
The delay, in seconds or centiseconds, to notify the upper layers after an interface transitions from a down state to an up state. Values-0 to 36000 seconds 
0, 10 to 3600000 centiseconds in 5 centisecond increments.

The delay, in seconds or centiseconds, to notify the upper layers after an interface transitions from an up state to a down state. Values-0 to 36000 seconds 
0, 10 to 3600000 centiseconds in 5 centisecond increments.
Specifies the units of your hold time in seconds or centiseconds.

ExtraInfo: Default: down 0 seconds - No port link down dampening is enabled; link down transitions are immediately reported to upper layer protocols.up 0 seconds - No port link up dampening is enabled; link up transitions are immediately reported to upper layer protocols.
